name: Awesome Ice Cream Truck Milkshake Jelly Maker Free
name_original: Awesome Ice Cream Truck Milkshake Jelly Maker Free
description:
Bringing you awesome Ice Cream Milkshakes from the Ice Cream Truck

Features:
- Dispense your original ice cream
- Choose from many flavors
- Toss it in, mix, and blend
- Pick your favorite cup and straw
- DRINK! REFILL IT! DRINK IT AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from: Flavors, cups, caps, decors, stickers and more!!


Download Awesome Ice Cream Truck Milkshake Jelly Maker right now and have fun mixing milkshakes

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Ice Cream Truck Milkshake Jelly Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
